title: Brexit Deal Delayed, Marijuana ETF, ‘Impossible’ Growing in U.S., Holiday Gift Guide
itunes:title: Brexit Deal Delayed, Marijuana ETF, ‘Impossible’ Growing in U.S., Holiday Gift Guide
description:
John Authers, Bloomberg Markets Senior Editor, discusses U.K. prime minister Theresa May announcing she will defer a Brexit vote and return to Brussels to seek “assurances” from European Union leaders. Jason Wilson, President of Budding Equity Asset Management, talks about investing in marijuana through an exchange traded fund. David Lee, COO and CFO at Impossible Foods, explains growing restaurant interest in their plant based meat product which is available in about 5,000 U.S. locations. James Gaddy, Bloomberg Pursuits Deputy Editor, shares items from the Pursuits Holiday Gift Guide. And we Drive to the Close of Markets with Henley Smith, Senior Relationship Manager at StoneCastle Cash Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
